name: General Digital Corporation
tag_list: rack-mount-monitors, sunlight-readable, flip-up-display, ntsc, nvis, mountable-lcd
overview:
For over 30 years, General Digital has been a designer and manufacturer of commercial, industrial- and military-grade flat panel monitors. They also perform in-house optical enhancements for LCD monitors, in order to improve brightness, contrast, shatter resistance and overall performance. Going hand in hand with its technological expertise, General Digital provides software testing and engineering services, primarily for aerospace and avionic software applications.

General Digital offers products that range from terminals to LCD monitors to fully integrated industrial computer systems. The unique advanced features of their products help them stand out from the competition because they manufacture equipment that can withstand most, if not all, harsh environments.

General Digital is a United States government registered small business that has evolved into the industry’s leader in innovative flat screen technology. They continue to serve the marketplace with advanced engineering and design capabilities of their American-made products.

milestones.source_description: General Digital: The Innovators of Flat Panel Technology
